tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V3.1.2.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: Everything is on the line
programme.desc: S2 E4 – The top teams of songwriters and producers have one more challenge before winning a publishing deal. S2 E4 – The top three teams of songwriters and music producers have one more challenge to face before the winning pair can walk away with a publishing deal and recording time.

programme.title: OUTDEH
programme.desc: Three young Jamaican men share their stories: a rapper, a surfer and a resident of Tivoli Gardens. Three young Jamaican men share their stories. Rapper Bakersteez hopes for an international career, Shama aims to be Jamaica’s first pro surfer and Romar shows us life in his community.

programme.title: Making OUTDEH: an interview with Louis Josek
programme.desc: In this interview by The Red Bulletin, film director Louis Josek talks about making his debut film, OUTDEH. In this interview by The Red Bulletin, film director Louis Josek talks about making his debut film, OUTDEH, and how he was inspired by the youth of Jamaica.

programme.title: Rivalries in Cliff Diving
programme.sub-title: The fierce competition of Red Bull Cliff Diving
programme.desc: Since 2009, Red Bull Cliff Diving World Series has featured great competitions and inspiring rivalries. Since 2009, Red Bull Cliff Diving World Series has featured great competitions and inspiring rivalries. Look back at the most epic, dramatic and surprising title contests in the history of the sport.

programme.title: How slippery is a supercar?
programme.desc: We seek to replicate the aerodynamic learnings of the Red Bull Holden Racing Team. In a sport where races are won by tenths of a second, we seek to replicate the aerodynamic learnings of the Red Bull Holden Racing Team and apply them to the human body, on a bicycle.

programme.title: Cooking with car parts
programme.desc: What culinary delights are possible with little more than a few key ingredients and a heated brake disc? Race cars are made to withstand and generate extreme heat. So with this heat in mind, what culinary delights are possible with little more than a few key ingredients and a heated brake disc?

programme.title: The calorie count
programme.desc: Host Danny Clayton tries to burn the same amount of calories as your average driver during the Bathurst 1000. Host Danny Clayton tries to burn the same amount of calories, in similar ambient conditions and equipment as your average driver pairing during Australia’s premier motor race, the Bathurst 1000.

programme.title: Fatigue and distraction
programme.desc: We serve up challenges to see if it’s possible for a supercars champ to overcome obstacles at high-speed. They say it takes 10,000 hours to fully master a skill. We serve up challenges to see if it’s possible for a seven-time supercars champ to overcome obstacles at high-speed.

programme.title: The adventure begins
programme.desc: Follow along on the ride as three young American racers prepare for the jump into the Rally Raid racing scene. Follow along on the ride as three young American racers, Seth Quintero, Blade Hildebrand and Mitch Guthrie Jr., prepare for the jump into the Rally Raid racing scene.

programme.title: Red Bull Hare Scramble
programme.desc: Relive some of the most iconic moments from the history of the Erzbergrodeo Red Bull Hare Scramble. The Erzbergrodeo Red Bull Hare Scramble is the toughest single-day Hard Enduro race in the world. Relive some of the most iconic moments from the history of the Iron Giant.

programme.title: The 2020 XCO season is here
programme.sub-title: Mercedes Benz UCI Mountain Bike World Cup 2020
programme.desc: Rob Warner and Lauren Smith jump start our cross-country memory ahead of the Nové Město double header. The 2020 XCO season is finally here! Join Rob Warner and Lauren Smith as they jump start our cross-country memory ahead of the Nové Město double header.

programme.title: Japan's AAA gaming
programme.desc: Japan is having a resurgence in AAA gaming after the last generation of game hardware saw growth in the west. The last generation of gaming hardware saw a growth in the number of western developers releasing content at a furious pace. But Japan is having a resurgence in AAA thanks to unique gameplay styles.

programme.title: Indie
programme.desc: Get to know independent heavyweights like Dylan Colburn and members of Japan's young game creating talent. Get to know the independent heavyweights like Pixel Junk Studios lead developer and Bit Summit founder Dylan Colburn, as well as members of Japan's next wave of young game creating talent.

programme.title: Arcades
programme.desc: Old and young alike discuss the importance of Japan's vibrant and flourishing arcade scene. Japan has a vibrant and flourishing arcade scene. Old and young alike discuss the importance of the arcade both recreationally and as a fundamental resource for pro and aspiring competitive gamers.

programme.title: Offline
programme.desc: For the Global Nitro team, snowboarding is one of the few things they do that truly allows them to be offline. Ever want to switch off and live in the moment? This feeling inspired the Global Nitro team to go offline and focus only on the next turn, side hit, tweak, airtime, carve, pow slash or high five.

programme.title: A Land Shaped by Women
programme.desc: Anne-Flore Marxer and Aline Bock go to Iceland to surf, snowboard and delve into the mindset of local women. As pro snowboarders who’ve fought for gender parity in their sport, Anne-Flore Marxer and Aline Bock spend winter in Iceland, the UN's number one-ranked nation for gender equality.

programme.title: Conquering the Storm
programme.sub-title: The day Cape Fear came alive
programme.desc: Red Bull Cape Fear, the world’s heaviest big wave surf event, has become a fixture of Australian surf scene. Red Bull Cape Fear might be the heaviest big wave surf event in the world. Held in extreme conditions, Cape Fear is establishing itself as a marquee event among the world’s best and bravest surfers.

programme.title: Rally Italia Sardegna from the air
programme.desc: Follow the fast and thrilling stage action from the air at Rally Italia Sardegna. Go inside the chase helicopter cockpits for a bird's-eye view and follow the fast and thrilling stage action from the air at Rally Italia Sardegna.

programme.title: Lucas Chumbo’s winter at Nazaré
programme.sub-title: Team Young Bulls recap with Kai Lenny
programme.desc: Lucas Chumbo relives his, and Young Bulls partner Kai Lenny’s, winter highlights at Nazaré. Lucas Chumbo breaks down his and Kai Lenny’s tow partnership from the 2019-20 winter at Nazaré, when they became the unbeatable Team Young Bulls in the World Surf League’s Nazaré Tow Surfing Challenge.

programme.title: PEACE
programme.desc: PEACE explores the moments for skateboarders when focus, confidence and perseverance triumph over obstacles. Element’s PEACE is an audiovisual journey that explores the moments for skateboarders when focus, confidence and perseverance triumph over all obstacles.
